name: 基礎量子力學（一）
description: 介紹量子力學的基本原理、觀念、計算方法和主要應用，使學生更深入了解近代物理。
goals: 了解量子力學的基本原理、觀念
syllabus:
內容與進度：

【授課方式：16+2週】

彈性授課: 居家自主學習量子力學發展與應用論文研讀與報告。

CH1 Mathematical Introduction: 4 weeks  12 Hrs

1\. Liner vector spaces

2\. Linear operators

3\. The eigenvalue problem

4\. Generalization to infinite dimensions

CH2 Review of Classical Mechanics: 3(7) weeks 9Hrs

5\. The Lagrangian mechanics

6\. The Halmiltonian mechanics

7\. Symmetries and their consequences

CH3 All is not well with classical mechanics: 1(8) week 3hrs

8\. All is not well with classical mechanics

9\. Mid-term examination

CH4 The Postulates—A general discussion: 3 (11)weeks 9hrs

10\. The postulates

11\. Discussion of postulates

12\. The Schrodinger equation

CH5 Simple Problems in One Dimension: 3 (14) weeks 9Hrs

13\. The free particle

14\. The particle in a box

15\. The single-step potential

16\. The final examination

methodologies.note: 挑選重要基礎主題講授

grading.note: 以隨堂小考、論文探討報告
